Paragraph: In summary , a novel conjugated polymer of PBDT-TDPP-S was successfully obtained , which contains a donor unit of benzo [1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene in main chain and an acceptor unit of diketopyrrolopyrrole in side chain.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| benzo [1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene |
| diketopyrrolopyrrole |

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| diketopyrrolopyrrole |
